What's New - December 2025

Hi everyone! Your Tennis Coordinator app just got a major upgrade. Here are the key improvements that make coordination even easier:

Better Mobile Experience

Your app now works better on your phone:

  • Bigger buttons - Easy to tap, no more missed clicks
  • Larger text - Easier to read without zooming
  • Works with notches - Safe on all modern iPhones and Androids
  • Smoother scrolling - Better touch response throughout

Faster & Smoother

  • 3x faster loading - App opens instantly
  • No more page reloads - Switching tabs is instant
  • Better offline support - Works even with spotty connection

Stay Updated

New Notification Center:

  • See who checked in or dropped out
  • Get alerts when watched members check in
  • Track all group activity in one place
  • Clear notification badge when you've caught up

Activity History

Know what changed:

  • See who checked in or removed themselves (with timestamps)
  • Track member additions and changes
  • View when matches were manually arranged
  • Filter by activity type (check-ins, notes, members, etc.)
  • Group by play date or when changes happened
Why this helps: No more wondering "Who dropped?" or "Did someone check in?" - just open Activity to see everything that happened.

Member Management

For everyone:

  • Add new members yourself (we track who added whom)
  • Edit member details (contact info, notes)
  • See the full member directory
Why this helps: Grow the group organically without waiting for admin. Want to bring a friend who plays regularly? Just add them!

Match Notes

  • Add notes to any match (court assignment, special plans, etc.)
  • Everyone can see notes for their matches
  • Edit notes anytime before the match
  • Notes appear in activity history

Example uses: "Let's meet at Court 3" â€¢ "Bringing extra balls" â€¢ "Running 15min late"

Weather Info

  • See current weather for our courts
  • Check temperature, wind, and conditions
  • Plan accordingly (bring jacket, sunscreen, etc.)

Calendar Integration

  • Add match to your calendar with one tap
  • Works with Google Calendar, Apple Calendar, Outlook
  • Automatic reminders from your calendar
  • Match details included

How These Changes Help YOU

Before:

  1. Open app (slow load)
  2. Tap through multiple pages
  3. Small buttons (easy to mis-tap)
  4. Check WhatsApp to see who dropped
  5. Ask admin to add new player
  6. No idea what the weather is

Now:

  1. Open app (instant)
  2. Bigger buttons, easier taps
  3. Check Activity tab to see all changes
  4. Add new members yourself
  5. See weather at a glance
  6. Add match to calendar with one tap
  7. Get notified when specific players check in

What's Still the Same

  • Core workflow (check in, see matches, share to WhatsApp)
  • Admin PIN protection
  • Private group data

The goal: Spend less time coordinating, more time on the court!
